title: See Emma Stone, Blake Lively, and More Stars Getting Ready for the Golden Globes
text:
See Emma Stone, Blake Lively, and More Stars Getting Ready for the Golden Globes 
Get a behind the scenes look at stars prepping for the red carpet. Instagram By Kristina Rodulfo Jan 8, 2017 
At tonight's Golden Globe Awards, celebrities are pulling out all the stops to make sure they have a good start to another red carpet season. From wearing sheet masks to picking out accessoriesâ€“see how all the stars are primping behind the scenes.
